an6.29:7.1: sivathikāya → sīvathikāya (sya-all, pts1ed) | chaṭṭitaṁ → chaḍḍitaṁ (bj, sya-all, pts1ed)
an6.29:8.1: Seyyathāpi vā pana → seyyathā vā pana (sya-all) | siṅgālehi → sigālehi (bj, pts1ed)
an6.29:9.4: disāvidisāvikkhittāni → disāvidisāsu vikkhittāni (bj) | kaṭiṭṭhikaṁ → kaṭaṭṭhikaṁ (bj) | phāsukaṭṭhikaṁ aññena piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhikaṁ aññena khandhaṭṭhikaṁ aññena gīvaṭṭhikaṁ aññena hanukaṭṭhikaṁ aññena dantakaṭṭhikaṁ aññena sīsakaṭāhaṁ → piṭṭhikaṇḍakaṁ aññena sīsakaṭāhaṁ (si, pts1ed) | piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṭṭhikaṁ aññena sīsakaṭāhaṁ (sya-all, km) | saṅkhavaṇṇappaṭibhāgāni → saṅkhavaṇṇūpanibhāni (bj, sya-all, pts1ed) | puñjakitāni → puñjakatāni (pts1ed)
